Parts.A: "You just got your shorts. Come back tomorrow, if you need more for your friends!

Greetings traveller.

  I am Chief Gollum, ruler over these barren lands.

  How can i help you?
Parts.B: I heard you can enhance certain armors?
Parts.C: I just wanted to enjoy the view

Parts.A:
yes.

  I have been sort of known for that, but you must bring me Flawless Zingarian shorts, absolutely flawless. No less than 10 blood, 5 Desert fools Berry pulp and I need explosives, lots of explosives. No less than 3! Bring me one baby shaleback too.
Parts.B: A lot of stuff. I'll get to it.

Parts.A:
Ah! you are back!
  I did not expect you so soon! Do you have the requested items?
Parts.B: Yes, I think I got everything

Parts.A: "That's not all. The Zingaran Shorts - flawless!, 10 blood, 5 Desert fools berry pulp, 3 Exlplosive jars and the shaleback baby!
Parts.C: Ah. I forgot but one of them

Parts.A:
Ah yes, very fine. That shaleback will be a nice companion. Now let me look at those shorts..

  Here's the shorts. They should serve well now.
